channel.title: Supernova - Cruzin (Album) [video game?]
channel.description:
I'm quite nervous, but excited to share what I got! I spent the past year on this little passion project of mine, and I finally published everything today! A lot of my friends told me these tracks sound like they'd be in a video game, so that's what I put for the genre haha. I'm not entirely sure what else to call it lol.
In short, it's all very melody-driven, and a lot of it is feel-good positive vibes!
I'd really appreciate comments and feedback of any sort!
https://soundcloud.com/cruzin941/sets/supernova
![SUPERNOVA Album Cover (FULL SIZE) (1)|500x500](upload://txYXUQeSyM3tb3cJgFsatpO7xRP.png)

Music has no rules. Make what you feel!
I think the melodys are not messy, more like complex and i like that!
Its like you said above: videogamey like.

item.title: Supernova - Cruzin (Album) [video game?]
item.dc:creator: Cruzin
item.description:
I appreciate the feedback! From your comment, I think you were talking about the first track. Did you feel that way about the whole track, or just certain sections (like the beginning where you commented)?

Heading into writing it, I felt that every layer kinda played off each other just fine, but I definitely see where you‚Äôre coming from. I did kind of go crazy with the layers haha. I‚Äôll definitely think about ‚Äúless is more‚Äù in the future for sure!

Read full topic
